thread.title: Peter Andre revives Rat Pack classics
thread.title_full: Peter Andre revives Rat Pack classics

title: Peter Andre revives Rat Pack classics
text:
0 comments 
WITH the release of his new studio album Come Fly With Me, Peter Andre has now announced details of a major UK arena and theatre tour that includes a mammoth show at Bournemouth International Centre in March 2016. 
The news of the Come Swing With Me tour also coincides with Peter’s participation on the current celeb-packed series of Strictly Come Dancing. 
It will see Peter Andre bringing the authentic swinging sounds of Rat Pack classics to the stage, backed by a live percussion and full brass section. 
“Performing live on stage is what I love doing best” says Peter. “Hopefully if you come to see my show you'll be impressed. I have put so much effort into production and choreography, we have a great team working with us. Please come and enjoy a wonderful evening with me. See you soon.” 
Inspired in part by the 100th anniversary of Frank Sinatra’s birth, Come Fly With Me is full of Peter’s takes on Rat Pack standards including the album title track Come Fly With Me, Mac The Knife and Ain’t That A Kick In The Head. 
It’s been 20 years since Peter was first catapulted into the public consciousness with his global hit Mysterious Girl. It’s been a remarkable journey: three chart-topping number 1 singles; a further seven Top 10 hits; and Platinum, Gold and Silver certifications for seven of his albums to date. Share article 
Tickets for the date, on March 17 2016, go on sale on Friday at 9am. 
Visit bhlivetickets.co.uk or call 0844 576 3000. Promoted Stories Peter Andre revives Rat Pack classics   Keep in touch with local news
